text.author: Wikivoyage community (see URL)
text.title: Zalalövő
text.s:
is a town in
Zala County
in the valley of Zala river .

p.s: The Roman legions created a military camp on the northern shore of the Zala river at the beginning of the 1st century .
Around the camp a village-like settlement founded .
In 124 , Emperor Hadrian gave town status for the settlement , and called as Municipium Aelium Salla .
However , in the middle of the 2nd century the invading Germanic tribes destroyed the settlement .
According to a 13th-century document , royal archers lived here .
Zalalövő was elevated to town status in 2000 .
This article includes travel-related information not only for Zalalövő , but also for the surrounding rural areas .

Direct trains are available once a day from
Budapest
-Déli pályaudvar via
Székesfehérvár
,
Veszprém
and
Zalaegerszeg
.
The journey takes 4 hours and costs 4840 Ft.
Other direct connections are :

item.s:
Toward east :
Zalaegerszeg
seven times a day .
The journey takes about 30 minutes and costs 465 Ft.

Toward west :
Őriszentpéter
seven times a day .

The journey takes about 15 minutes and costs 310 Ft. There are direct international trains via Bajánsenye to Hodoš (
Slovenia
) four times a day , and to
Ljubljana
once a day .

text.s: There is no ticket office , tickets can be purchased on the train .
The train station is just 700 m away from the center .

p.s:
Frequent buses are available from
Zalaegerszeg
.

The journey takes about 30 minutes and costs 465 Ft. From
Budapest
-Népliget , you have to transfer in Zalaegerszeg .
The whole journey from Budapest takes 4 hours and costs 4770 Ft.
There is no local public transport or taxi service .

You can use the regional buses operated by
ÉNYKK
.
In Zalalövő :

item.s: ( Mindenszentek római katolikus kápolna ) , Petőfi Sándor utca 100 .
Built in 1810 in late Baroque style .
( Szent Anna római katolikus templom ) , Kossuth Lajos utca 66 , Zalapataka .
( Szent László király római katolikus templom ) , Szabadság tér .
May – Oct Tu – F Su 09:00 – 12:00 13:00 – 16:00 on appointment .
Archaeological site and exhibition about the Roman age of Zala County .
May – Oct Tu – F Su 09:00 – 12:00 13:00 – 16:00 on appointment .
Built in the middle of the 19th century .

p.s: In Bagod :

item.s: ( Szent Pál-kápolna ) , Rákóczi Ferenc utca , Szentpál , Bagod .
Built around 1260 as round church , rebuilt and extended with a nave and a tower in 1755 .

p.s: In Böde :

s.hi: Saint Michael Archangel Roman Catholic Church

item.s: ( Szent Mihály arkangyal római katolikus templom ) , Zalaszentmihályfa , Böde .
The church was founded around 1220 , destroyed churches have been restored around 1750 , the shrine was rebuilt .
Sacristy was built in the 19th century .
In 1923 it was improved and redesigned .

In Zalaháshágy :

item.s: ( Szentháromság római katolikus templom ) , Petőfi Sándor utca 7 , Zalaháshágy .
Built in the 12th century , and rebuilt in 1860 in Baroque style .

p.s: In Zalaszentgyörgy :

item.s: ( Szent György római katolikus templom ) , Zalaszentgyörgy .
Built in Romanesque style in the 13th century , and rebuilt in the 14th century in gothic style , and rebuilt again in 1756 in Baroque style .
Lake with beach and sports , fishing possibilities .
Artifical lake with beach and sports , fishing possibilities .
( Pro Equus Lovaspark ) , Szent Erzsébet utca 61 , Bagod , ☏ +3620 988-9863 , fax : +3692 460-626 , ✉ info@bagodilovaspark.hu .
Lunge , riding training , trail riding , jump training , riding-tour .
Riding training : 4500 Ft , single room : 7000 Ft , double room : 9500 Ft.
( Zabolázó Lovasudvar ) , Fő utca 40 , Hottó , ☏ +3630 208-4445 , ✉ jani@zabolazo.hu .

In the surroundings :

item.s: Pizzeria and fast food bar . 1350 Ft , pizza : 1500 Ft , hamburger : 650 Ft.
Pizzeria and fast food bar with some traditional food .
Traditional restaurant and pizzeria with local cuisine and with specialties like prósza and deer stew with dödölle .
